byline.original: By ADEEL HASSAN and VICTORIA SHANNON

docs.snippet: Uruguay advanced to the Round of 16 with a 1-0 victory over Italy, but the victory was overshadowed by the alleged biting of a player by Uruguay’s Luis Suarez.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay advanced to the Round of 16 with a 1-0 victory over Italy, but the victory was overshadowed by the alleged biting of a player by Uruguay’s Luis Suarez.

headline.main: World Cup 2014: Uruguay Defeats Italy, 1-0, to Advance Out of Group D

docs.snippet: A regulator is close to picking a corporate monitor for Credit Suisse. | The dismissal of American Apparel’s chief raises corporate-governance questions. | The Supreme Court erects new hurdles to class actions for securities fraud. | Three traders...

Cohen’s family office.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Monitor for Credit Suisse Named

docs.snippet: Success for North and Central American teams in Brazil is fueling the region's ambitions for future World Cups.

docs.snippet: These teams might have expected to be fighting for first place in the group in this game. Instead they both lost to the astounding Costa Rica and are fighting for survival.
docs.abstract: These teams might have expected to be fighting for first place in the group in this game. Instead they both lost to the astounding Costa Rica and are fighting for survival.

headline.main: Italy vs. Uruguay: World Cup 2014 Live Blog

docs.snippet: Costa Rica conquered mighty Uruguay and Italy and is on course to win this Group of Death. Its joyous play has made it many fans’ new favorite, and striker Joel Campbell has emerged as a breakout star.
docs.abstract: Costa Rica conquered mighty Uruguay and Italy and is on course to win this Group of Death. Its joyous play has made it many fans’ new favorite, and striker Joel Campbell has emerged as a breakout star.

headline.main: Costa Rica vs. England: World Cup 2014 Live Blog

docs.snippet: Italy coach Cesare Prandelli has brought Ciro Immobile into his starting side to play alongside Mario Balotelli in an untested strike partnership for the World Cup Group D showdown against Uruguay at the Dunas arena on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy coach Cesare Prandelli has brought Ciro Immobile into his starting side to play alongside Mario Balotelli in an untested strike partnership for the World Cup Group D showdown against Uruguay at the Dunas arena on Tuesday.

headline.main: Italy Bring in Immobile to Face Unchanged Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Italy Bring in Immobile to Face Unchanged Uruguay

docs.snippet: British bars and pubs are already counting the costs of England's early World Cup exit, their expectations of a bumper summer dashed by the team's failure to make it through the tournament's first round.
docs.lead_paragraph: British bars and pubs are already counting the costs of England's early World Cup exit, their expectations of a bumper summer dashed by the team's failure to make it through the tournament's first round.

headline.main: England's Early World Cup Exit Dashes UK Pubs' Bumper Summer Hopes
headline.print_headline: England's Early World Cup Exit Dashes UK Pubs' Bumper Summer Hopes

docs.snippet: Ciro Immobile is joining Mario Balotelli in attack for Italy, while Uruguay will rely on Luis Suarez and Edinson Cavani again for their decisive Group D match at the World Cup on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Ciro Immobile is joining Mario Balotelli in attack for Italy, while Uruguay will rely on Luis Suarez and Edinson Cavani again for their decisive Group D match at the World Cup on Tuesday.

headline.main: Italy Adds Immobile for Decisive Game vs. Uruguay
headline.print_headline: Italy Adds Immobile for Decisive Game vs. Uruguay

docs.snippet: Costa Rica has made two changes to its lineup from its wins over Uruguay and Italy, with coach Jorge Luis Pinto deciding to rest a couple of players before the knockout phase begins.
docs.lead_paragraph: Costa Rica has made two changes to its lineup from its wins over Uruguay and Italy, with coach Jorge Luis Pinto deciding to rest a couple of players before the knockout phase begins.

headline.main: Costa Rica Makes 2 Changes to Lineup vs England
